raw_code_preview: def self.accept_invitation(team_id, inviter_user_id, invited_user_id, assignment_id) # if you are on a team and you accept another …
gold_comment: This method handles all that needs to be done upon a user accepting an invitation. First the users previous team is deleted if they were the only member of that team and topics that the old team signed up for will be deleted. Then invites the user that accepted the invite sent will be removed. Last the users team entry will be added to the TeamsUser table and their assigned topic is updated
Set 2 (Phi-2): # Accepts an invitation from another user to join a team, but only if the current team is empty and the new team does not already have any members. If these conditions are met, it releases all previously selected topics for the team and removes the team from the database.
Set 3 (Phi-3-mini): # Checks whether accepting an invitation is valid based on current membership; deletes associated records when no other member exists in the new team
